name: Cosmic Sacrifice
description:
Cosmic Sacrifice is a game where you maintain the universe.

Birth stars, bring life to planets and watch the universe be born.

Use followers to generate energy and energy to create suns. You need planets for your followers to live on. Followers die, suns die. The game is very difficult currently and needs to be tweaked.

Written in an hour and a half for GodJamIt using Processing by @jctwood.

The star generator can be found as a standalone sketch here.
